attributes.action: ask the media to stop branding all Muslims "Terrorists"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a white, English, Anglo Saxon gay male. I am fed up of news reports that say things like "Islamic Fundamentalist" when refering to Al Qua ida or the Taliban" and I believe that this kind of reporting causes segregation from our neighbours. No one has the right to associate religion with their behaviour ! Let's judge people by who they are and not by what they believe. The media should call Terrorists "Terrorists" and not prefix with any religion.

From
Paul Murphy

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
